p: Daily non-accidental mortality data in Guangzhou during 2010–2015 were obtained from Guangdong Provincial Center for Disease Control and Prevention (GDCDC). Non-accidental deaths were categorized using A00-R99 codes from the International Classification of Diseases 10th Revision (ICD-10). YLLs were calculated by matching each death by age and sex to the life table of China for the year 2010 [ 18]. Total daily YLLs were calculated by summing the YLLs for all deaths on the same day. We also estimated the daily YLLs for males, females, and people aged <65 and ≥65 years, respectively.
